summary: A small Army of Greeks spearheaded by three hundred Spartans do battle with the whole invading Persian Army.
cast: Richard Egan|Ralph Richardson|Diane Baker|Barry Coe|David Farrar|Donald Houston|Anna Synodinou|Kieron Moore|John Crawford|Robert Brown|Laurence Naismith|Anne Wakefield|Ivan Triesault|Charles Fawcett|Michalis Nikolinakos|Sandro Giglio|Anna Raftopoulou|Dimos Starenios|Yorgos Moutsios|Nikos Papakonstantinou|John G. Contes|Marietta Flemotomos|Kostas Baladimas|Zannino
title: El león de Esparta
